attributes.action: To give the one that are on incapacity benefit nhs services like glasses Medication prescribed by GP ect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are on Incapacity Benefit you are low income and you nead Medication most off the time, glasses,cost to the hospital,teeth,and more. We nead more help with the cost

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
